backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining comprehensive healthcare platform types (hospitals, professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances, medical records, research projects) with role-based access control, blob storage mixins, and registration request workflows with pending/approved/rejected statuses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting PIN code input field additions and auto-fill functionality across four registration forms (Careers, Vendors, AmbulanceServices, NgoListing) with associated test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling, describing role-based dashboards, admin functionality, registration forms with PIN code auto-fill, chatbot, and authentication flows.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color variables for Royal Teal primary colors, Royal White backgrounds, and sidebar/chart theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AI Health Zon application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes (onboarding, home, about, solutions, careers, vendors, ambulance, NGOs, dashboard, admin, contact, legal pages) with Layout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: Floating chatbot component with expandable interface, message history, auto-scroll, typing indicator, and contextual responses about healthcare services, contact info, RCM, technology, careers, vendors, ambulances, and NGOs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying brand information, navigation links organized in columns (Quick Links, Services, Legal), social media icons, and copyright notice with app identifier.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component that wraps the application with Navigation header, main content area using Outlet for routing, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation header component with responsive menu, authentication controls, and dynamic navigation links that include admin section with pending request badge for authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: Component that displays a list of pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) with loading and empty states, rendering each request using RequestDetailCard.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form component for new users to select account type (hospital, professional, vendor, NGO) and enter their name, saving the profile via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Expandable card component displaying detailed request information with approve/reject actions, contact methods (WhatsApp, email), and formatted submission date for different request types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating data including user profiles, hospitals, healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, and registration requests. Provides hooks for admin checks, location filtering, and submission of various stakeholder registration requests.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming including light and dark mode color schemes for UI components like backgrounds, borders, cards, and sidebar elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About page displaying company mission, vision, core purpose, and value propositions for different stakeholders (hospitals, professionals, vendors, NGOs) with feature cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that verifies admin access and displays pending registration requests for healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, and ambulance services in tabbed interface with summary statistics.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Page for registering ambulance services with auto-fill location from PIN code and searching for ambulance services by city, including service type selection (emergency, ICU, event).
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Career opportunities page with registration form for healthcare professionals including role selection, CV upload with progress tracking, and auto-fill location from PIN code lookup.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a form for user inquiries and cards displaying contact information (address, phone, email, WhatsApp). Includes form validation, submission handling with toast notifications, and a Chatbot component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that displays different metrics and cards based on user type (hospital, professional, vendor, NGO). Shows ProfileSetup component if user profile is not yet created, and requires authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Static informational page displaying 12 healthcare support categories (workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, home healthcare, mental health, vendors, NGOs, compliance, insurance, training, logistics) in a grid of cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section introducing AI Health Zon platform, three main verticals (RCM, Healthcare Technology, Healthcare Connecting Platform) displayed in cards, and call-to-action buttons for demo requests and joining the network.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Directory page with search and filter functionality to browse hospitals, vendors, and NGOs from the network. Fetches data using custom hooks and displays filtered results in cards with contact information and external links.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: NGO listing and registration page with form for submitting NGO details (name, registration number, focus area, services, contact info) and a filterable list of approved NGOs. Includes PIN code lookup for auto-filling city/state and uses React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Animated onboarding flow that auto-plays through stakeholder approvals (hospitals, doctors, nurses, vendors, ambulances, NGOs) with visual feedback. Features auto-advance, manual controls, and completion screen before navigating to home.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static privacy policy page displaying information collection practices, data usage, sharing policies, security measures, and user rights in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Static refund policy page outlining eligibility criteria, request process, processing times, non-refundable items, and cancellation terms in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Solutions showcase page displaying healthcare platform offerings including RCM (Revenue Cycle Management), technology solutions, and stakeholder network features with icons and detailed feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Static terms and conditions page covering acceptance of terms, service usage rules, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and modification rights in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Vendor registration page with form for vendor details (name, category, products, contact, location) that auto-fills city/state from PIN code lookup and displays list of all registered vendors with their status.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Utility function that validates and looks up Indian PIN codes using the India Post API (postalpincode.in) to retrieve city and state information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions for colors (using OKLCH), border radius, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining AI Health Zon as a multi-stakeholder healthcare platform with RCM, technology solutions, and connecting platform features, including admin approval workflows and PIN code auto-fill functionality.
